webwork-tex.statement:
For the curve given by \(r(t) = \langle 8 t, e^{7 t}, e^{-7 t} \rangle\),
\par Find the derivative \leavevmode\\\relax \(r'(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the second derivative \leavevmode\\\relax \(r''(t) = \langle\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}}, \mbox{\parbox[t]{10ex}{\hrulefill}} \(\rangle\) \par Find the curvature at \(t = 0\) \leavevmode\\\relax \(\kappa (0) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}}
